metadata.title: CVE-2021-47206 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:host: ohci-tmio: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()It will cause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL, weneed check the return value.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1076.85').
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-2060.62').
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-2042.46').
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-2025.27').
